pnp:DataRow.pnp:DataValue: Set up your profile, including a photo, in Office 365
Find the closest printer. Add the printer to Windows. Print a test job. Go to the printer. Tap your badge to release the job you sent. TEST THIS before you need it ;-)
Install productivity apps on your phone
Install the Office, OneDrive, SharePoint, Yammer, Teams, and OneNote on your phone
Install productivity apps on your phone
Be sure to sign up for your benefits within 30 days. Make this a priority to complete within week one
Apply for corporate credit card. Make this a priority to complete within week one. Apply for corporate credit card membership rewards (fee is your personal expense)
Meet with your manager. Identify with your manager key internal partners you should meet with over the coming weeks and months
Write a short bio and provide to your manager so they can introduce you to the team
Get the Expenses app from the App Store. Set the interim approver to your admin.
Meet with your onboarding buddy. Set up a meeting cadence for the next 4-6 weeks
Ensure VPN is set up and working
VPN is set up and working urayrh s
Follow the CEO on Yammer and Twitter
Meet with your manager. Agree on your priorities over the next 30-60-90 days
Meet with one or two internal business partners in week two
Browse and join relevant Yammer communities. Review what communities your manager and team members are part of and consider joining
Complete training about how to book business travel
Complete training about the different tools and systems used at the company
Complete confidential information policy training playlip
Complete the department business overview, culture and processes training
Department training - memos, all hands, annual plan, townhalls
Employee resource groups and social clubs
Review and join relevant employee resource groups and social clubs
Employee resource groups and social clubs listing
Complete the standards of business conduct training
Complete the guidelines and policies training pleeklipolici
Complete the Performance management and rewards training
Attend the monthly virtual live event to meet company leaders and connect with your cohort
Complete your development plan and set your priorities for the year
Have a 1:1 with your skip manager (manager's manager)
Leverage your buddy! Besides asking onboarding questions, try requesting feedback or discuss how to be successful on the team
Attend the monthly virtual live event to meet company leaders and connect with your cohort
Meet with three or four internal business partners in month two
Complete the new employee onboarding survey to tell us how we did and help us improve the process.
Attend the monthly virtual live event to meet company leaders and connect with your cohort
Leverage your buddy! Besides asking onboarding questions, try requesting feedback or discuss how to be successful on the team

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
CONTOSO ENGINEERING

Our disciplines

Each discipline has their own strength and focus, but we all collaborate as one team. To learn more about how we work together, visit how we work.
Service Engineers (SE)
Site Reliability Engineers (SRE)
Software Engineers (SWE)
UX Engineers
Welcome to Contoso Engineering! Hear from our VP of Engineering

pnp:Header.TopicHeader: hello! i'm a new team member

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Welcome to the team! We'd love to get to know you, so please include a bio about yourself and pictures here! You can add web parts, move content around, and make this page uniquely yours.

pnp:Header.TopicHeader: hello! i'm a new team member

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Hello everyone! 👋🏼​​​​​​​

I'm Adele Vance. I'm from Yucatan, Mexico and I'm joining Engineering team. I’m thrilled to be joining Contoso Electronics. I’ve long been a fan and an early adopter of the latest technologies, and nothing could be better than joining a company that is on the cutting edge of innovation in this area. I see so much great talent here, and my focus will be on harnessing the experience, ideas, and skills of everyone in the organization to advance Contoso Electronics as THE industry leader. When I’m not at work, I enjoy hiking with my dog, boating, and volunteering.


Look forward to meeting you!

pnp:Header.TopicHeader: hello! i'm a new team member

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Hello new team members!

I'm Christine Cline, but I go by Chris. I'm originally from Detroit, Michigan and I'm joining Engineering team. 

I’m thrilled to be joining Contoso Electronics. I’ve long been a fan and an early adopter of the latest technologies, and nothing could be better than joining a company that is on the cutting edge of innovation in this area. I see so much great talent here, and my focus will be on harnessing the experience, ideas, and skills of everyone in the organization to advance Contoso Electronics as THE industry leader. When I’m not at work, I enjoy hiking with my dog, boating, and volunteering.

pnp:Header.TopicHeader: hello! i'm a new team member

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Hello, I'm Pradeep.

I’m thrilled to be joining Contoso Electronics. I’ve long been a fan and an early adopter of the latest technologies, and nothing could be better than joining a company that is on the cutting edge of innovation in this area.

I see so much great talent here, and my focus will be on harnessing the experience, ideas, and skills of everyone in the organization to advance Contoso Electronics as THE industry leader. When I’m not at work, I enjoy:

  • 🥾+🐕 hiking with my dog
  • 🛥️ 🚣 boating
  • 👐 🏳️‍🌈 volunteering

pnp:Header.TopicHeader: hello! i'm a new team member

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Serial chips and salsa eater, married a Canadian, all around computer nerd. Oh, by the way - hello my name is Grady.

I’m thrilled to be joining Contoso Electronics. I’ve long been a fan and an early adopter of the latest technologies, and nothing could be better than joining a company that is on the cutting edge of innovation in this area. I see so much great talent here, and my focus will be on harnessing the experience, ideas, and skills of everyone in the organization to advance Contoso Electronics as THE industry leader. When I’m not at work, I enjoy hiking with my dog, boating, and volunteering.

A few words from our CVP

Watch as our CVP, Patti Fernandez speaks to our goal of making you feel welcome and confident as you get ready to join.

Review items on the onboarding list

View the checklist and start working on tasks. Remember, sometimes growth can be uncomfortable so take it one day at a time.

Make an introduction

​​​​​​​Make your arrival known in an "About me" intro news post. Introduce yourself to the team, write a quick bio and share fun facts.

HELLO 👋

Welcome to Contoso Engineering, we're excited to have you on the team

We are dedicated to engineering excellence because its a huge part of our business and the core of our products. We want you to help you reach your career goals by continuously investing in your growth and development. We can't wait to get to know you, and to see you grow with us!​​​​​​​

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
GETTING STARTED​​​​​​​

Onboarding checklist

Use this checklist as your guide for the next 90 days. Work alongside your manager to prioritize tasks and get introductions to colleagues you will be collaborating with. Remember, sometimes growth can be uncomfortable so take it one day at a time and never hesitate to reach out for support.

INTRODUCTIONS TO THE TEAM​​​​​​​

Write an intro

We want to get to know you. Make your arrival known in an "About me" introductory news post that will be shared with the engineering organization.

Introduce yourself to the team, share fun facts, and even include pictures of your family or pets! Once published, your post will show up in Contoso engineering news.

Step 1: Create a new post

In the upper left corner of the command bar, select +New, and select News post.

Step 2: Select template

In the template panel, select the New hire introduction and select Create post.

Step 3: Draft your news post

Share a brief biography, a picture of yourself, and feel free to design the post so its uniquely yours.

Step 4: Post your news

While you're working select Save as draft and when your post is ready, select Post news.

A MESSAGE FROM OUR CVP

The world changes when we change our perspective.

It’s my pleasure to extend a warm welcome to each one of you as you get ready to join Contoso Electronics. This is an environment where our employees can make an impact and make a difference. Use this opportunity to pursue whatever drives your passion. I personally feel the big reason for continuing to grow as a company and continuing to attract new talent is because we need you to help us figure out what the new world is all about.

The organization

Learn more about the types of engineers at Contoso and think about how you might be collaborating with us in the future.  Find out more information about leadership, team members, contact information, links to their respective team sites, and office locations. Connect with us on Yammer or Microsoft Teams. ​​​​​​​

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Service Engineers (SE)

Service engineers are responsible for product management and maintenance. We focus on corrective and preventive maintenance as well as other after-sales technical support solutions. We work directly with customers in order to provide guidance and solutions to complex technical problems in the field.  ​​​​​​​

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Benefits

Q: When can I make changes to my current health benefits?

A: Open enrollment occurs once a year starting on July 1st and closing on July 31st. During this time period, you can make changes to your health plan, your health savings account, and other plan related details. Add this year's open enrollment reminder to your calendar. 

One change you can make at anytime is adding or removing dependents from your health plan.


Q: What are my tuition assistance options?

A: Contoso is proud to reimburse all full-time employees who have been employed with Contoso in a full-time capacity for a minimum of 3 months with a 50% reimbursement of all educational related expenses. Educational expenses can only be reimbursed once the Contoso employee has completed and successfully passed the course. Learn more about which courses qualify for reimbursement and how to enroll in accredited learning programs.


Q: Is there a physical fitness discount or reimbursement program?

A: Yes - there are several financial incentives to stay healthy. Contoso employees receive a 20% discount off membership packages for pre-approved health services. Services include gym memberships, class packages for select cycle and yoga studios, and wellness services like acupuncture and meal delivery services.

Contoso employees also receive a maximum of $500 in health credits towards pre-approved health services that expires at the end of each fiscal year. Learn more about using health credits.


Q: Who do I talk to about relocation benefits?

A: Relocation benefit package details are negotiated with the hiring manager. Visit the Contoso HR portal to check the status of your relocation package, learn how to request a reimbursement, and other relocation services like introductions to local real estate agents and contacts at local schools grades kindergarten though high school.​​​​​​​
Payroll

Q: What are the paid holidays?

A: Contoso observes 13 national paid holidays annually, and also offers 4 days worth of floating holiday time that can be used to celebrate holidays that fall outside of national holidays. Floating holidays cannot carry-over to the following year's holiday paid time off. Learn more about how vacation time accrual and requests work.


Q: What is the payroll schedule?

A: Paychecks are dispersed every other Friday. View the payroll schedule to see specific payroll time frames and disbursement dates. Consider going paperless and signing up for direct deposit.


Q: How does paid time off accrual work?

A: Full time Contoso employees start accruing vacation time after the first 90 days from the start date and will automatically be granted 4 floating holidays that can be used for any occasion. Vacation time never expires, and can be rolled over to the next year with the exception of floating holidays.

Paid time off will start accruing at 5 hours per pay period. After being employed with Contoso in a full time capacity for 5 years or more, you will accrue 7 hours of vacation time per pay period. View your paid time off balance in the HR portal.
Time off

Q: When do I become eligible for paid time off?

A: Full time Contoso employees start accruing vacation time after the first 90 days from the start date. Vacation time never expires (with the exception of floating holidays), and can be rolled over to the next year. View your paid time off balance in the HR portal.


Q: What are the paid holidays for offices that aren't located in the America's?

A: Contoso observes 13 national paid holidays annually, and also offers 4 days worth of floating holiday time that can be used to celebrate holidays that fall outside of national holidays. Depending on your office location, you may be eligible for approved, paid time off to celebrate traditions that are important to you. Contact your local HR representative and work with your manager to make arrangements for time off. 


Q: Where can I view my current vacation time balance?

A: View your paid time off balance in the HR portal.


Q: How does taking a leave of absence work?

A: Taking a leave of absence means you need more time than paid time off or sick leave allows but you don't want to resign from your position or working at Contoso. Taking a leave of absence usually means you need anywhere from 3 months to up to 12 months of time off. Learn more about how to arrange a leave of absence.
Career

Q: Where can I learn more about career planning?

A: Career planning should start from your first day on the job. Throughout the year there are several career planning related events, mentorship matching opportunities, and resources to help you accelerate your career goals. Career planning should be a conversation that happens in 1:1s with your manager too.


Q: Where do I go to refer someone for a job?

A: To refer others to open full time positions at Contoso, direct people to the Contoso job board and to enter your name in the "referred by" field for each job application.


Q: Where do I view open job positions at the company?

A: Full time positions can be viewed on the Contoso job board. However, for current employees, there is an additional internal job board that is designed to facilitate introductions to others on potential teams and provide resources on how to change positions or take on a leadership role.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
FY20: BALANCED INNOVATION

Our priorities are a reflection of our values, perspectives, big-bets in technology, and the needs of our customers.

In 2020, we are focusing on high-impact investments that balance innovations in the areas of engineering, product development, and customer engagement.

Modernize core experiences​​​​​​​

Improve product usability and accuracy for core modern workloads to increase product adoption for low-confident user segment by 20%.

Grow usage across business segments

Develop a new self-help online resource center that offers video tutorials, and a new quick answers content experience to increase customer confidence and reduce support calls by 15%.

Focus on end users and drive engagement

Invest in R&D to develop a communication model that will double current user engagement and attract new consumer retail accounts.

Improve engineering systems and processes

Optimize core engineering services by investing in software updates and improvements by adopting a new engineering operations process that prioritizes a zero-carbon footprint.

BIG, AMBITIOUS GOALS

Supporting our team

We prioritize delivering for our customers in 2020 as much as we do with our team members too. We've got big, ambitious goals this year and we know that means our people will need more support than ever. In response, we are immediately offering expended health benefits that include reimbursements for fitness expenses and mental health services. We encourage you to learn more about how we plan on taking care of you in 2020.

We prioritize delivering for our customers in 2020 as much as we do with our team members too. We've got big, ambitious goals this year and we know that means our people will need more support than ever. In response, we are immediately offering expended health benefits that include reimbursements for fitness expenses and mental health services. We encourage you to learn more about how we plan on taking care of you in 2020.
